thread.title: 2 more colleges revoke honorary degrees given to Bill Cosby
thread.title_full: 2 more colleges revoke honorary degrees given to Bill Cosby

title: 2 more colleges revoke honorary degrees given to Bill Cosby
text:
> Pennsylvania 2 more colleges revoke honorary degrees given to Bill Cosby FILE - In this Friday, Nov. 21, 2014, file photo, comedian Bill Cosby performs at the Maxwell C. King Center for the Performing Arts, in Melbourne, Fla. On Thursday, Oct. 15, 2015, both Tufts University in Massachusetts and Goucher College in Maryland rescinded honorary degrees previously awarded to Cosby by the respective institutions. (AP Photo/Phelan M. Ebenhack, File) The most compelling, sharable stories from across the web.
